markdownRemark.html: This golf course is located 1.5 Km from Jerez town centre, only 10 minutes from Jerez airport, 50 minutes from Seville airport and just 12 minutes from the beach. The facilities includes a pro-shop, clubs room, changing room, terrace grill, cafeteria, and restaurant. The golf course is suitable for both amateurs and professionals.
